name: Secret Photo
description:
· This is a role-playing game.
· The player takes on the role of a photographer who runs a photography studio
· The studio receives custom photography orders from customers every day
· Players hire female models to collaborate in photo shoots, in order to earn commission
· The commissions earned can be used to improve camera, build new scenes, and hire higher grade female models
· 3D model
· Models with different styles
· Rich dress matching
· Novel photography gameplay
